sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import {
    Box,
    Typography,
    Grid,
    Paper,
    Button,
    Divider,
    List,
    ListItem,
    ListItemIcon,
    ListItemText,
    Chip,
    Avatar
} from '@mui/material';
import {
    Lightbulb,
    CheckCircle,
    TrendingUp,
    WarningAmber,
    AutoFixHigh,
    Description,
    Assignment,
    LocalOffer,
    Storefront,
    People
} from '@mui/icons-material';
import { insights } from '../data/analyticsData';

const SolutionCard = ({ title, recommendation, impact, effort, icon, color }) => (
    <Paper sx={{ p: 4, height: '100%', borderLeft: `6px solid ${color}`, position: 'relative', overflow: 'hidden' }}>
        <Box sx={{ position: 'absolute', top: -10, right: -10, opacity: 0.1, transform: 'scale(2)' }}>
            {icon}
        </Box>
        <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', mb: 2 }}>
            <Avatar sx={{ bgcolor: color, mr: 2 }}>{icon}</Avatar>
            <Typography variant="h6" fontWeight="bold">{title}</Typography>
        </Box>
        <Typography variant="body1" paragraph color="text.secondary">
            {recommendation}
        </Typography>
        <Divider sx={{ my: 2 }} />
        <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center' }}>
            <Box>
                <Typography variant="caption" display="block" color="text.disabled">POTENTIAL IMPACT</Typography>
                <Chip label={impact} size="small" sx={{ bgcolor: color + '20', color: color, fontWeight: 'bold' }} />
            </Box>
            <Box sx={{ textAlign: 'right' }}>
                <Typography variant="caption" display="block" color="text.disabled">EFFORT LEVEL</Typography>
                <Chip label={effort} size="small" variant="outlined" />
            </Box>
        </Box>
    </Paper>
);

const Prescriptive = () => {
    return (
        <Box sx={{ pb: 4 }}>
            {/* Header */}
            <Box sx={{ mb: 4, display: 'flex', alignItems: 'flex-start', justifyContent: 'space-between' }}>
                <Box>
                    <Typography variant="h4" fontWeight="900" gutterBottom sx={{ color: '#d32f2f' }}>
                        ðŸ’¡ Prescriptive Analytics
                    </Typography>
                    <Typography variant="h6" color="text.secondary">
                        "The Solution" â€” Actionable strategies to optimize business outcomes
                    </Typography>
                </Box>
                <Button variant="contained" startIcon={<Description />} sx={{ bgcolor: '#333399' }}>
                    Generate Strategy PDF
                </Button>
            </Box>

            {/* Strategic Intervention Level */}
            <Paper sx={{ p: 4, mb: 4, background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #1a237e 0%, #311b92 100%)', color: 'white' }}>
                <Grid container spacing={4} alignItems="center">
                    <Grid item xs={12} md={8}>
                        <Typography variant="h5" fontWeight="bold" gutterBottom>
                            ðŸš€ Executive Recommendation: Q2 Recovery Plan
                        </Typography>
                        <Typography variant="body1" sx={{ opacity: 0.9, mb: 3 }}>
                            Our data analysis confirms that the sales dip was a direct result of price sensitivity (elasticity > 1.2).
                            To achieve the "Optimistic" forecast of â‚¹8,500 by June, we must implement the following interventions.
                        </Typography>
                        <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', gap: 2 }}>
                            <Button variant="contained" color="secondary" size="large" sx={{ fontWeight: 'bold' }}>
                                Implement All
                            </Button>
                            <Button variant="outlined" sx={{ color: 'white', borderColor: 'rgba(255,255,255,0.5)' }}>
                                View Details
                            </Button>
                        </Box>
                    </Grid>
                    <Grid item xs={12} md={4} sx={{ textAlign: 'center' }}>
                        <Typography variant="h2" fontWeight="900">+15%</Typography>
                        <Typography variant="subtitle1">Targeted Rev. Growth</Typography>
                    </Grid>
                </Grid>
            </Paper>

            {/* Solutions Grid */}
            <Grid container spacing={3} sx={{ mb: 4 }}>
                <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
                    <SolutionCard
                        title="Dynamic Pricing Model"
                        recommendation="Adjust unit price to â‚¹110. This is the 'Sweet Spot' identified in diagnostic analytics that balances volume and margins."
                        impact="High Revenue"
                        effort="Medium"
                        icon={<LocalOffer />}
                        color="#d32f2f"
                    />
                </Grid>
                <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
                    <SolutionCard
                        title="Competitor Counter-Strike"
                        recommendation="Launch loyalty bonus points during March and October (competitor discount peaks) to insulate top-tier customers from churning."
                        impact="High Retention"
                        effort="High"
                        icon={<People />}
                        color="#ff9800"
                    />
                </Grid>
                <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
                    <SolutionCard
                        title="Inventory Realignment"
                        recommendation="Reallocate 20% of 'Clothing' marketing budget to 'Beauty' category to capitalize on the 60% profit margin and lower return rates."
                        impact="Max Profit"
                        effort="Low"
                        icon={<Storefront />}
                        color="#4caf50"
                    />
                </Grid>
                <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
                    <SolutionCard
                        title="AI Churn Prevention"
                        recommendation="Automate outreach with a unique 'We Miss You' discount code for the 100 customers identified in the 'At Risk' segment."
                        impact="Medium"
                        effort="Medium"
                        icon={<AutoFixHigh />}
                        color="#2196f3"
                    />
                </Grid>
            </Grid>

            {/* Project Blueprint Connection */}
            <Typography variant="h5" fontWeight="bold" sx={{ mb: 3, display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center' }}>
                <Assignment sx={{ mr: 1 }} color="primary" /> Project Execution Blueprint
            </Typography>
            <Grid container spacing={3}>
                <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
                    <Paper sx={{ p: 3, height: '100%', bgcolor: '#f5f5f5' }}>
                        <Typography variant="subtitle1" fontWeight="bold" color="primary" gutterBottom>
                            PHASE 1: CLEANUP
                        </Typography>
                        <Typography variant="body2">
                            Integrate CRM feedback loops to update 'Complaints' variable in real-time.
                        </Typography>
                    </Paper>
                </Grid>
                <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
                    <Paper sx={{ p: 3, height: '100%', bgcolor: '#f5f5f5' }}>
                        <Typography variant="subtitle1" fontWeight="bold" color="primary" gutterBottom>
                            PHASE 2: DEPLOYMENT
                        </Typography>
                        <Typography variant="body2">
                            Roll out the dynamic pricing API to the e-commerce storefront.
                        </Typography>
                    </Paper>
                </Grid>
                <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
                    <Paper sx={{ p: 3, height: '100%', bgcolor: '#f5f5f5' }}>
                        <Typography variant="subtitle1" fontWeight="bold" color="primary" gutterBottom>
                            PHASE 3: MONITORING
                        </Typography>
                        <Typography variant="body2">
                            A/B test the Beauty category marketing spend against previous months.
                        </Typography>
                    </Paper>
                </Grid>
            </Grid>

            {/* Evidence Link */}
            <Box sx={{ mt: 6, p: 3, textAlign: 'center', border: '2px dashed #ccc', borderRadius: 2 }}>
                <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                    All recommendations are backed by the findings in
                    <Button color="secondary" sx={{ fontWeight: 'bold' }}>Diagnostic Analytics</Button>
                    and validated by
                    <Button color="primary" sx={{ fontWeight: 'bold' }}>Predictive Models</Button>
                </Typography>
            </Box>
        </Box>
    );
};

export default Prescriptive;
